thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com | 2 of 58
thread.title: Nat PF

author: Nat PF
title: Nat PF
text: Airtasker doesn't confirm with people requiring the job done if the job was actually completed, they release funds without checking. Allows scammers to be on the page and steal our money. I assigned someone for a job, as this person updated details as he had completed the job 1 minute after, which is not true and has declined my request to cancel. Why should he receive my money when he did nothing. Spreading the word with everyone and everywhere. Don't use this service
